languages.text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
languages.original_text: Если противник получил {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от навигатора, то при получении {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} из любого источника этот противник получает +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% варп-урона дополнительно. Прирост варп-урона суммируется за каждый случай получения урона от навигатора до 5 раз.

traits.locale_text: Enemies damaged by the Navigator suffer +<u>2×(Navigator's PER bonus)</u>% additional damage from warp. The bonus damage is stacking for each hit.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

languages.text: Если противник получил {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от навигатора, то при получении {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} из любого источника этот противник получает +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% варп-урона дополнительно. Прирост варп-урона суммируется за каждый случай получения урона от навигатора до 5 раз.
languages.original_text: Enemies damaged by the Navigator suffer +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% additional damage from warp damage. The bonus damage stacks for each hit.

traits.locale_text: Получая урон от навигатора, противники получают +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора)</u>% дополнительного варп-урона. Дополнительный урон от каждого попадания суммируется.
Получая урон от навигатора, противники получают +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора)</u>% дополнительного варп-урона. Дополнительный урон от каждого попадания суммируется.
Получая урон от навигатора, противники получают +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% дополнительного варп-урона. Дополнительный урон от каждого попадания суммируется.

languages.text: 当导航者对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，目标接下来受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}都会提高{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%。每当导航者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，此效果都会叠加，最多叠加5次。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: 当导航者对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，目标接下来受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}都会提高{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%。每当导航者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，此效果都会叠加，最多叠加5次。
当导航者对敌人造成伤害时，目标接下来受到的亚空间伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%。每次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}都会提高额外伤害。

languages.text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañados{/g} por el navegante sufren +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de daño adicional de todas las fuentes de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}. Este daño adicional se acumula con cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} del Navegante hasta un máximo de 5 veces.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañados{/g} por el navegante sufren +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de daño adicional de todas las fuentes de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}. Este daño adicional se acumula con cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} del Navegante hasta un máximo de 5 veces.

Los enemigos dañados por el navegante sufren un +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de daño adicional de toda fuente de daño de disformidad. Este daño adicional se acumula con cada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}.

languages.text: Feinde, denen der Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, erleiden +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % zusätzlichen Schaden durch alle Quellen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Der Bonusschaden stapelt sich für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} des Navigators. Dieser Effekt kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, denen der Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, erleiden +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % zusätzlichen Schaden durch alle Quellen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Der Bonusschaden stapelt sich für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} des Navigators. Dieser Effekt kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden.

Gegner, die vom Navigator beschädigt werden, erleiden +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% zusätzlichen Schaden durch Warpschaden. Der Bonusschaden addiert sich für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} auf.

Feinde, denen der Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, erleiden +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % zusätzlichen Schaden durch alle Quellen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Der Bonusschaden stapelt sich für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} des Navigators. Dieser Effekt kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}blessés{/g} par le navigateur subissent +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} supplémentaires de toutes les sources. Le bonus de dégâts se cumule à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté par le navigateur. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}blessés{/g} par le navigateur subissent +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} supplémentaires de toutes les sources. Le bonus de dégâts se cumule à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté par le navigateur. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois.

Les ennemis auxquels le Navigateur a infligé des dégâts subissent +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de dégâts supplémentaires dus au Warp. Le bonus de dégâts se cumule à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g}.

Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}blessés{/g} par le navigateur subissent +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} supplémentaires de toutes les sources. Le bonus de dégâts se cumule à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté par le navigateur. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois.

languages.text: 航宙士から{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}による被ダメージが{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%増加する。このボーナスダメージは、航宙士が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する度にスタックする。この効果は、最大5回までスタック可能。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士から{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}による被ダメージが{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%増加する。このボーナスダメージは、航宙士が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する度にスタックする。この効果は、最大5回までスタック可能。
航宙士からダメージを受けた敵は、ワープダメージによる被ダメージが+{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}%される。このボーナスダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する度に累積する。

languages.text: Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiği düşmanlar, her türlü kaynaktan +%{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalırlar. Bonus hasar, Rotacı'nın yaptığı her {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} ile üst üste birikir. Etki en fazla 5 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from any source of {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The bonus damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicted by the Navigator. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
